dataAcquisition.description: Processes for acquiring new data for learning and decision-making.

activeLearning.description: Actively seeks out new data based on identified knowledge gaps.

passiveLearning.description: Passively collects new data from ongoing operations and interactions.

dataStorage.description: Handles storage of acquired data and insights.

shortTermStorage.description: Stores data temporarily for immediate use in learning and decision-making.

longTermStorage.description: Stores data permanently for future reference and learning.

dataProcessing.description: Processes raw data into a format suitable for learning and decision-making.

featureExtraction.description: Identifies and extracts relevant features from preprocessed data.

dataEvaluation.description: Evaluates the quality and relevance of data for learning and decision-making.

relevanceCheck.description: Checks the relevance of data based on current knowledge base and goals.

qualityCheck.description: Checks the quality of data based on predefined quality criteria.
